entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 01:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain or light snow mixed with freezing rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
